channel.title: Questions
channel.description:
Hi i have been playing runescape for about 2 years now and untill last week i never new about private servers
here are my questions:
how hard is it? how much downloading is there? what am i able to do? can i get any item and any level and keep them if i got to a normal world (members)?
thats all i can think of right now if someone can answer those that would be great

item.title: Questions
item.dc:creator: @spid3rm4n spid3rm4n
item.description:
@spid3rm4n wrote:

how hard is it? - Real easy to run the server just a little knowledge of java is helpful & if you just want to play its even easier.

how much downloading is there? - You only need to download a client to play (Moparscape) if you want to host your own server you need to download a base source.

what am i able to do? - If you are playing on someone elses server you may be limited to only training but if you host your own there is no limit.

can i get any item and any level and keep them if i got to a normal world (members)? - if you mean make an acc on a private server & get items then go onto normal rs the answer is no.

Read full topic
